options.command: RAILWAY_VARS=$(railway variable --json --service "Zero Main DB") && vite-node src/migrate/run-cli.ts migrate --host "$(printf '%s' "$RAILWAY_VARS" | jq -r '.RAILWAY_TCP_PROXY_DOMAIN')" --port "$(printf '%s' "$RAILWAY_VARS" | jq -r '.RAILWAY_TCP_PROXY_PORT')" --database "$(printf '%s' "$RAILWAY_VARS" | jq -r '.POSTGRES_DB')" --password "$(printf '%s' "$RAILWAY_VARS" | jq -r '.PGPASSWORD')" --user "$(printf '%s' "$RAILWAY_VARS" | jq -r '.POSTGRES_USER')"
